item.content:encoded: This is an example of a WordPress page, you could edit this to put information about yourself or your site so readers know where you are coming from. You can create as many pages like this one or sub-pages as you like and manage all of your content inside of WordPress.

item.title: Homepage
item.dc:creator: pwpadmin
item.content:encoded: Welcome to your new Website. This is your Front page. You can modify the contents of this page at anytime by logging in and editing it. You can add pictures, add links, and format text as needed. You can also embed video and audio if desired. You can also change your "Front Page" to any be any of your other pages or your Latest Posts under Settings > Reading. Your blog will display new posts as you add them. You can also add additional pages like this about us page. Finally, there is a very robustcontact form you can activate by following these instructions.

item.title: Blog
item.dc:creator: pwpadmin
item.content:encoded: Your Latest Blog Posts will appear here if you have this page set as your "Posts Page" under Settings > Reading

item.title: About Us
item.dc:creator: afang
item.content:encoded:
Social media has dramatically changed the way we share and connect with friends and family, and it will have an even more profound impact on the way companies operate.

Enterprise social networking empowers employees to be more productive and successful by enabling them to collaborate easily, make smarter, faster decisions, and self-organize into teams to take on any business challenge. This new way of working drives business alignment and agility, reduces cycle times, increases employee engagement and improves relationships with customers and partners. Giving your organization the advantage of a social foundation is critical for success in todays fast-paced environment. Our trusted enterprise solution lets employees share and connect with coworkers or external business contacts such as customers and partners in a private, secure environment. Give your business the social advantage and see fast results with Yammer. Work is a big part of our lives. And Yammer is making a big impact on work:
  • Pioneered Enterprise Social Networking when we launched in 2008
  • Among the fastest growing enterprise software companies in history, exceeding over three million users in just three years
  • More than 80 percent of the Fortune 500 are using Yammer
  • Leading organizations including Deloitte, Ford, Nationwide, 7-Eleven, Orbitz Worldwide, Rakuten, and Telefonica O2 have adopted Yammer
  • More than $57 million in venture funding from top tier firms
  • Built social from the ground up with Facebook DNA: Facebooks Founding President, Sean Parker serves on Yammers Board of Directors; Yammer and Facebook share the same first investor, Peter Thiel; backed by Social+Capital Partnership - a fund established by former Facebook Vice President, Chamath Palihapitiya
  • Recognized as a Leader in "The Forrester Wave: Mobile Collaboration, Q3 2011"
  • Recognized with Deloitte Australia in the 2011 Forrester Groundswell Awards as the winner in the Management: Collaboration System category
  • Named an "Innovative Application Software Company Under $100 Million to Watch, 2011" by IDC

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my blog. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickies to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: pwpadmin
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start blogging!

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
Your Name (required)
[text* your-name]

Your Email (required)
[email* your-email]

Subject
[text your-subject]

Your Message
[textarea your-message]

[submit "Send"]

a:8:{s:6:"active";s:0:"";s:7:"subject";s:14:"[your-subject]";s:6:"sender";s:26:"[your-name] <[your-email]>";s:4:"body";s:120:"Message body: [your-message]
-- This mail is sent via contact form on My New Website http://public-stage.int.yammer.com";s:9:"recipient";s:12:"[your-email]";s:18:"additional_headers";s:0:"";s:11:"attachments";s:0:"";s:8:"use_html";s:1:"0";}

a:6:{s:12:"mail_sent_ok";s:43:"Your message was sent successfully. Thanks.";s:12:"mail_sent_ng";s:93:"Failed to send your message. Please try later or contact the administrator by another method.";s:16:"validation_error";s:74:"Validation errors occurred. Please confirm the fields and submit it again.";s:12:"accept_terms";s:35:"Please accept the terms to proceed.";s:13:"invalid_email";s:28:"Email address seems invalid.";s:16:"invalid_required";s:31:"Please fill the required field.";}

Yammer brings the power of social networking to the enterprise in a private and secure environment. Yammer is as easy to use as great consumer software, but designed for collaboration across your company. Connect people, teams, content and even business applications with productivity software that employees love to use.

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start blogging!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
Hi, this is a comment.
To delete a comment, just log in and view the post's comments. There you will have the option to edit or delete them.

a:1:{i:0;s:125:"Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. ";}
a:1:{i:0;s:39:"Yammer as a Solution for Sales Brochure";}

My first experience with this sort of internal social concept was when a former employer of mine adopted Yammer, a sort of internal Twitter, for its sales team. Reps across the country helped each other out, solved problems and offered encouragement. Yammer helped us build a better sales team.

a:2:{i:0;s:196:"With Yammer, we receive rapid deployment of critical knowledge across all of our stores. Our store managers across the United States share best practices on ways to better serve target customers.";i:1;s:24:"Woah! I like this thing!";}
